mapper.select: select * from free_board order by free_board_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into free_board( free_board_no, free_board_title, free_board_content, free_board_category ) values ( #{freeBoardNo}, #{freeBoardTitle}, #{freeBoardContent}, #{freeBoardCategory} )
mapper.update: update from free_board set free_board_title = #{freeBoardDto.freeBoardTitle}, free_board_content = #{freeBoardDto.freeBoardContent}, free_board_category = #{freeBoardDto.freeBoardCategory} where free_board_no = #{no}
